name: The history of Unity Engine
description:
Try to escape the boundaries of educational obligations by solving a puzzle. You can follow birds to acquire random objects, or fly through space for the chance of a red gem.

Also, There are going to be 3 lag spikes at the beginning of the game, one for each map. This is because of how the save map function works, It is essentially only saving what changes, and every tile is different from no value, so it is a bit of a slow save.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Move

Space Key: Place things, or exit the intrusive space game popups

Mouse: Interact with UI

Information acquired from:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unity_Technologies#:~:text=Unity%20Technologies%20was%20founded%20as,game%2C%20GooBall%2C%20in%202005.

https://techcrunch.com/2019/10/17/how-unity-built-the-worlds-most-popular-game-engine/#:~:text=Unity%20was%20founded%20in%20Copenhagen,based%20game%20developers%20like%20himself.

https://venturebeat.com/2022/03/16/unity-report-number-of-games-made-with-unity-grew-93-in-2021/

https://create.unity.com/2021-game-report
